place.note: The region around the Nile River in the north-east corner of Africa.
The Armenian colophon included in Khach‘ikyan, XV Dari, II: no. 368, p. 284-285, Sanjian, Colophons, 1469 (no. 6), is misdated by them to 1469 when in fact it was composed in 1446.
